title: Online Service-Learning-Based Professional Ethics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Office/administrative work experience as a professional, with intermediate-level domain expertise.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ethical dilemma cases that may occur in real science education settings and propose solutions
Learners can conduct ethical problem-solving projects with community partners using online collaboration tools

Learners develop three educational materials reflecting professional ethics principles in science education (social responsibility, leadership, legal compliance) and submit an evaluation report achieving an average score of 4+ (out of 5) across four peer/instructor rubric items.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
